name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: During his speech to the U.N., President Trump paused for what he thought was an applause line and was met by silence. President Trump, welcome to my world.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: While at the U.N., President Trump also called the Iran nuclear deal an "embarrassment." Then Trump said, "Gotta go â€” I have to post a tweet of me hitting a woman with a golf ball."

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Today at the U.N., President Trump threatened to return immigrants to their home countries. After making those comments he got a standing ovation from Melania.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: T-Mobile and Sprint are in talks for a possible merger. The merger will happen after T-Mobile texts Sprint at 2 a.m. and asks, "U up?"

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Apple is exploring ways to turn Siri into people's personal therapist. In fact, this morning when I asked Siri for today's weather she said, "Stop trying to replace your father."

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: A new app lets people take selfies with virtual versions of "The Today Show" anchors. The app is called Why?
